website_summaries.verdict: While not fancy, this is a good-looking metal beverage tub that has a bit of a rustic feel, and can keep beverages chilled for hours while you entertain.
pros: Features a simple design in durable stainless steel that can hold as much as 5 gal
Handles feel strong and are easy to grip
cons: Tub is inscribed with the words "Cold Drinks," which may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Photoshoot ready
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and just as advertised!!! Size was great, color in tact, everything was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia h

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package the item had a broken handle and a smashed in side. I wanted to use this for pictures and I had to come up with another idea for my daughters 6 month pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mrich

customer_reviews.title: Practical and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Also very versatile. Can be used for other purposes. It held 4 bottles of prosecco and ice and presented well. Did not leak!
customer_reviews.author: gina n.

customer_reviews.title: Fun ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is larger than I thought it would be but worked perfect for my gift. Bucket is sturdy. Don’t use the handles to carry heavy things in the bucket, carry from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Going to use at our intimate wedding reception for beverages. Very appealing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee-Anne Ebbers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby shoot!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to take pictures of my baby in it with lemons and it came out sooo cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Agapito

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buckets
customer_reviews.text: We are building a new house and I am using them for my kitchen sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: Bucket leaked
customer_reviews.text: Bucket failed as a bucket. It has a leak in it. Could not hold water.
customer_reviews.author: camefortheAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product not too big or too small for indior/outdoor use! Just what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Clicquot

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but handle broke a few days after arrival
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size and an attractive galvanized drink tub, but one side of one of the handles popped off before I ever even had a chance to use it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Great tub for a nice fountain
customer_reviews.text: This tub was the perfect size for a gift I made for my daughter-in-law. Good quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: CherokeeSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a large bucket. Held several bottles of champagne. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bucket!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this bucket. We are using it as a sink in our rustic powder room.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Allaire

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required from what I saw. Super sturdy, nice design. I used this for a photo shoot for my son. Now it’s being used for its intended purpose. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi & David Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good size for home/deck party
customer_reviews.text: A galvanized ice bucket is a pretty standard party supply. This one works well. It is oval and not round and should be fine for most moderate to small parties. Depending on the type of drink and size of bottles/cans/etc, you should be able to get 20-30 without much problem. It has not leaked for me, which is one problem I have had with some tubs. It does say 'Cold Drinks' on both sides, which I did not see in the pictures before I got it. (One of the images you can see that, but I missed it). I had intended put vinyl on it, but because the letters are already there, I decided not to.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Shields

customer_reviews.title: Chiller tub...
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable steel tub; it holds about 5 gallons. This is a great tub for outdoor parties or to transport beverages. There are handles for ease in transportation. The dimensions are 13.78x18.9x10.24.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: For BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold beverages for a BBQ and it is perfect! It's large enough to put a lot of drinks in with a ton of ice to keep them cold. It looks great and made a really nice centerpiece for the food table. I'm very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Ok but seams leaked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a photo shoot with my baby. But the seams were not together and all the water came out. I wouldn’t use it to hold I’ve for drinks either, because it’s make the ground all around it wet.
customer_reviews.author: Susann_uh

customer_reviews.title: More Than An Ice Tub
customer_reviews.text: Amazon's Mind Reader Ice Bucket Beverage Chiller Tub is multipurpose. If you're limited on space it can be used for storage in the utility room. It has a decorative, rustic, galvanized-style steel. I use it in our family room to hold silk plants. When we have guests at Thanksgiving, it is easy for me to lift out the silk plants and then use the Chiller Bucket for ice and beverages. The handles seem to be quite sturdy. Because of its size and our space limitations it makes sense to multipurpose the tub in this way. The ways this bucket can be used are limited only by our imaginations.
customer_reviews.author: Moderate Risk

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great for house parties and gettogethers to keep your drinks cold. Its a good size of 13.78 x 18.9 x 10.24 and has a oval shape instead of round. Its durable steel with the writing cold drinks on it, on both sides. The handles are nice to hold, which makes it easier to move it around. It can hold any size drinks you like, quantity that fits depends on what type of drink it is. This type of bucket can be used for a lot of stuff if you choice to. Fits perfect for my birthday parties and will work great with catering gigs in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A Fancy Way to Spruce up you Table
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent display item. We got it to use at a drink sales booth, and it is perfect for that. Throw in ice and some cold drinks, and you are ready! Light, but strong. I like the classy, rustic look.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Coia

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Perfect for a party, or to use at home. it is very cool looking and matches my kitchen décor perfectly. works great to keep beverages cold with ice, or just as a bin for any purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bailey

product_meta.title: Mind Reader Bucket, Silver Ice Tub
product_meta.description: When you have a party, everyone needs drinks whether it's a beer, soda, water or juice! Don't run in and out to the refrigerator, instead this ice bucket tub will save you many trips! It's the perfect tub for holding all of your ice and beverages for a hot summer day outside. No more missing the family and friends fun.
feature_bullets: Made of durable steel to hold a heavy duty amount
Holds all of your favorite beverages while keeping them cold
Handles for easier transportation from the refrigerator to outside
A great way to serve your beverages in style as a host

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
